title: Company Info for Due Diligence
description: For a due diligence project, an agent must compile a background report on a target company.

tasks.description: Find the company's official registration details, address, and list of directors.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent retrieves correct corporate information from official registries.

tasks.description: Search for any recent negative news or litigation involving the company.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds and summarizes any relevant negative news.

tasks.description: Compile the information into a structured background report.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a clean report with all the gathered information.
